mapper.select: select u.USER_ID, u.USERNAME, u.NAME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.RIGHTS as USER_RIGHTS, u.PASSWORD, u.SKIN, u.NUMBER, r.ROLE_ID, r.ROLE_NAME, r.RIGHTS as ROLE_RIGHTS, r.PARENT_ID from SYS_USER u left join SYS_ROLE r on u.ROLE_ID=r.ROLE_ID where u.STATUS=0 and u.USER_ID=#{USER_ID}
select TOTAL_TIME from sys_user where USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
select l.JOB_RANK from sys_user u LEFT JOIN bd_employee e on u.NUMBER = e.EMP_CODE LEFT JOIN bd_position_level l on e.EMP_GRADE_ID = l.ID where u.USERNAME=#{USERNAME}
SELECT a.*, b.OPEN_ID, b.USER_ID, a.EMP_DEPARTMENT_ID deptId FROM bd_employee a LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON b.NUMBER = a.EMP_CODE WHERE a.ID = #{EMP_ID}
select USERNAME, NUMBER, NAME, DEPT_ID from sys_user where DEPT_ID = #{deptId} and ENABLED = 1
